Open the graphics category from the main screen and click F-Spot Photo Manager
* Application launches two windows
** Main Application window
** Photo Import Dialog
OR for NH specific device
Open the graphics category from the main screen and click  Photo Manager
* Application launches two windows
** Main Application window
** Photo Import Dialog

Adding Images to F-Spot
* Import source can be Camera or Folder
* Individual images can be added
* After imported, images appear in main application screen as thumbnails

Tags can be assigned to images
* Multiple tags can be assigned to the same image
* Images can be sorted by tags
* Tags can be created by user and assigned

Images can be edited
* Crop image
* Remove redeye
* Adjust color
* Convert to black and white
* Convert to sepia tones
* Adjust angle of the image
* Create soft focus
* Auto color adjust
